p: A total of 369 potential interactions were recorded with 52 different drugs. 20.92% (n = 78) were X-risk interactions, 63.32% (n = 233), D-risk and the remaining 15.76% (n = 58), C-risk. The drug with the highest rate of interaction was inhaled budesonide (11.41%, n = 42), followed by simvastatin (9.51%, n = 35) and atorvastatin (7.07%, n = 26). The rates of interactions by drug, together with the description of each interaction according to: mechanism, risk level, impact, and recommendation of each interaction, are summarized in Table 2 . 37.7% (n = 136) of the patients had no interaction, 62.3% (n = 225) had one or more potential interactions, and 26.87% (n = 97) had 2 or more interactions.
